home_about_description: An intense 48-hour event where entrepreneurs, developers, designers, and business minds come together to build innovative solutions to real-world problems.
home_feature_idea_desc: Get immediate feedback from mentors and peers on your concept.
home_feature_network_desc: Connect with talented individuals from diverse backgrounds.
home_feature_learn_desc: Gain hands-on experience in design, development, and business.

home_faq_subtitle: Everything you need to know about the WeekendStartupSVC Challenge
home_how_description: From registration to final pitch, here's your journey through the WeekendStartupSVC Challenge
home_step_1_desc: Sign up and share your innovative concept or join as a team member.
home_step_2_desc: Connect with developers, designers, and business experts to create the perfect team.
home_step_3_desc: Work intensively with your team to develop a minimum viable product (MVP).
home_step_4_desc: Present your solution to judges and compete for prizes and recognition.
